amendatorysection.catchline: Department of Veterans' Affairs; offices; employees.
amendatorysection.para: Suitable offices shall be provided for the Department of Veterans' Affairs. The department may incur the necessary expense for office furniture, stationery, printing and other incidental or necessary expenses and employ such clerical and other employees and assistants as the department deems necessary for the proper transaction of its business.

crossreference.para: Annual property inventory, requirement, see section 81-157.
